normalised: Hey there, social media enthusiasts! Ever wondered if your Insta reels are really resonating with your followers? The buzz is all about follower analytics, and it is getting a major upgrade.

unnormalised: Hey there, social media enthusiasts! Ever wondered if your Insta reels are *really* resonating with your followers? The buzz is all about follower analytics, and it's getting a major upgrade.
normalised: Platforms are now offering way more detailed insights, from peak engagement times (perfect for scheduling those evening posts when everyone is scrolling after dinner!) to audience demographics. Think granular data like, are more folks from Mumbai or Delhi double-tapping your content? What is their age group? Doctor Sharma from I I M Ahmedabad thinks this is a game-changer for influencer marketing in India.

unnormalised: Platforms are now offering way more detailed insights, from peak engagement times (perfect for scheduling those evening posts when everyone's scrolling after dinner!) to audience demographics. Think granular data like, are more folks from Mumbai or Delhi double-tapping your content? What's their age group? Dr. Sharma from IIM Ahmedabad thinks this is a game-changer for influencer marketing in India.
normalised: Imagine tailoring your content specifically for your audience in Bangalore! Forget vague impressions – we are talking conversion rates, click-through rates, and even detailed breakdown of how many rupees you can expect per one thousand views! This means better R O I and less wastage on campaigns that are just… blah.

unnormalised: Imagine tailoring your content specifically for your audience in Bangalore! Forget vague impressions – we're talking conversion rates, click-through rates, and even detailed breakdown of how many Rs. you can expect per 1000 views! This means better ROI and less wastage on campaigns that are just… blah.
normalised: For influencers renting out spaces for shoots, even linking those analytics to real estate data (e.g., tracking how many followers a shoot in a two thousand square feet apartment attracts versus a studio) is becoming a thing! Get ready to deep-dive into those numbers folks; it is about more than just vanity metrics now!

unnormalised: For influencers renting out spaces for shoots, even linking those analytics to real estate data (e.g., tracking how many followers a shoot in a 2000 sq ft apartment attracts vs. a studio) is becoming a thing! Get ready to deep-dive into those numbers folks; it's about more than just vanity metrics now!
